item.title: Understanding the Basics of Machine Learning
item.description: Machine learning is something that shows up all around us today—whether we’re aware of it or not. From personalized suggestions on YouTube and Netflix to automatic spam filtering in our inboxes, it’s quietly powering a lot of the tools we use daily.
